class.name: Spell
class.brief_description: Base [Spell] class. Contains data, and callbacks for spell scripts. Inherit from this to create spells with different functionality.
class.description: Base [Spell] class. Contains data, and callbacks for spell scripts. Inherit from this to create spells with different functionality.

method.name: _aura_calculate_initial_damage
method.description: Calculate initial damage when this spell is applied as aura.

method.name: _aura_calculate_initial_heal
method.description: Calculate initial heal when this spell is applied as aura.

method.name: _aura_get_description
method.description: Return description with substituted values. The default implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member aura_text_translation_key] is set using the [member aura_text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.

method.name: _aura_sapply_passives_damage_deal
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before dealing damage.

method.name: _aura_sapply_passives_damage_receive
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before receiving damage.

method.name: _aura_sapply_passives_heal_deal
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before dealing heal.

method.name: _aura_sapply_passives_heal_receive
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before receiving heal.

method.name: _equip_should_deny
method.description: Whether to deny equiping an item.

method.name: _get_description
method.description: Return description with substituted values. The default implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member text_translation_key] is set using the [member text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.

method.name: _notification_ccategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: _notification_ccategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: _notification_scategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: _notification_scategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: aura_get_description
method.description: Return description with substituted values. The default implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member aura_text_translation_key] is set using the [member aura_text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.

method.name: aura_sapply_passives_damage_deal
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before dealing damage.

method.name: aura_sapply_passives_damage_receive
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before receiving damage.

method.name: aura_sapply_passives_heal_deal
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before dealing heal.

method.name: aura_sapply_passives_heal_receive
method.description: Apply passive modifiers before receiving heal.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_get_base_mod
method.description: Get stat attribute base modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_get_bonus_mod
method.description: Get stat attribute bonus modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_get_percent_mod
method.description: Get stat attribute percent modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_get_stat
method.description: Get stat attribute stat modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_set_base_mod
method.description: Set stat attribute base modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_set_bonus_mod
method.description: Set stat attribute bonus modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_set_percent_mod
method.description: Set stat attribute percent modifier at index.

method.name: aura_stat_attribute_set_stat
method.description: Set stat attribute stat at index.

method.name: equip_should_deny
method.description: Whether to deny equiping an item.

method.name: get_description
method.description: Return description with substituted values. The default implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member text_translation_key] is set using the [member text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.

method.name: is_aura
method.description: Should this spell get applied as aura?

method.name: notification_ccategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: notification_ccategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: notification_scategory_cooldown_added
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) added notification.

method.name: notification_scategory_cooldown_removed
method.description: Category cooldown (= spell school lockout) removed notification.

method.name: on_learn_cast_spells_num_get
method.description: Get the number of spells that will be cast when this spell is learned.

method.name: on_learn_cast_spells_num_set
method.description: Set the number of spells that will be cast when this spell is learned.

method.name: spell_cast_on_caster_get
method.description: Get a spell that will be cast on the caster.

method.name: spell_cast_on_caster_set
method.description: Set a spell that will be cast on the caster.

method.name: spell_cast_on_learn_get
method.description: Get the number of spells that will be cast when learning this spell.

method.name: spell_cast_on_learn_set
method.description: Set the number of spells that will be cast when learning this spell.

method.name: spell_cast_on_target_get
method.description: Get a spell that will be cast on the target.

method.name: spell_cast_on_target_set
method.description: Set a spell that will be cast on the target.

method.name: spells_cast_on_caster_num_get
method.description: Get the number of spells that will be cast on the caster.

method.name: spells_cast_on_caster_num_set
method.description: Set the number of spells that will be cast on the caster.

method.name: spells_cast_on_target_num_get
method.description: Get the number of spells that will be cast on the target.

method.name: spells_cast_on_target_num_set
method.description: Set the number of spells that will be cast on the target.

members.member: WHat type of auras this spell dispells.
Should this aura scale with level?
If this is a talent it's required spell.
If this is a talent it's required talent.

Aura description. The default [method aura_get_description] implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member aura_text_translation_key] is set using the [member aura_text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.
Translation key. The description key is this + "_DESC".
Can this spell be casted while moving?
Hide this spell from the actonbar? Can be used if actionbars are automatically show spells.
Is this a local spell? Local spells only run on clients. Can be used for utility spells, like next / previous target, emotes, etc.
Does this spell needs a target?
Does the Projectile scene use speed?
Does the projectile scene use time?
Spells that will be cast on caster.
Spells that will be cast when learning this spell.
Spells that will be cast on target.

Description. The default [method aura_get_description] implementation will: 1. Get the translated string for the description if [member aura_text_translation_key] is set using the [member aura_text_translation_key] + "_DESC" key. 2. Replace %%property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns. 3. Replace %#property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * class_level / max_class_level. 4. Replace %$property_name with the value that get(property_name) returns * character_level / max_character_level.
Translation key. The description key is this + "_DESC".

constants.constant: Spell cast in front of caster.
